ModMetaData.name: All The Plant Genes
ModMetaData.author: JamHam
ModMetaData.description:
Adds loads of new plant genes for Adamas' plant genes mod! 

Concuct crazy plants like insta-growing, self-healing rice, glowing devilstrand growing in hydroponics, self harvesting corn that releases toxic gasses, and much, much more! 

Load after Adamas' Plant Genetics mod. 

Find the wiki here:https://github.com/JamEstHamEst/JHE2_MoPlantGenes/wiki for any information on all possible genes!
